481:1: atha khalu akṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat-kena kāraṇena bhagavan avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'valokiteśvara ityucyate?
481:2: evamukte bhagavānakṣayamatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-iha kulaputra yāvanti sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi yāni duḥkhāni pratyuanubhavanti,
481:3: tāni sacedavalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuḥ,
481:5: ye ca kulaputra sattvā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
481:7: sarve te avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tejasā tasmānmahato'gniskandhāt parimucyeran|
481:8: sacet punaḥ kulaputra sattvā nadībhiruhyamānā avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryuḥ,
481:10: sacet punaḥ kulaputra sāgaramadhye vahanābhirūḍhānāṃ sattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvajravaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālāśmagarbhamusāragalvalohitamuktādīnāṃ kṛtanidhīnāṃ sa potasteṣāṃ kālikāvātena rākṣasīdvīpe kṣiptaḥ syāt,
481:11: tasmiṃśca kaścidevaikaḥ sattvaḥ syāt yo'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryāt,
481:13: anena khalu punaḥ kulaputra kāraṇena avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'valokiteśvara iti saṃjñāyate||
481:14: sacet kulaputra kaścideva vadhyotsṛṣṭo'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyākrandaṃ kuryāt,
481:16: sacet khalu punaḥ kulaputra ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturyakṣarākṣasaiḥ paripūrṇo bhavet,
481:17: te'valokiteśvarasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyagrahaṇena duṣṭacittā draṣṭumapyaśaktāḥ syuḥ|
481:18: sacetkhalu punaḥ kulaputra kaścideva sattvo dārvāyasmayairhaḍinigaḍabandhanairbaddho bhavet,
481:20: tasyāvalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyagrahaṇena kṣipraṃ tāni haḍinigaḍabandhanāni vivaramanuprayacchanti|
481:21: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ||
481:22: sacetkulaputra ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhāturdhūrtairamitraiścauraiśca śastrapāṇibhiḥ paripūrṇo bhavet,
481:23: tasmiṃścaikaḥ sārthavāho mahāntaṃ sārthaṃ ratnāḍhyamanardhyaṃ gṛhītvā gacchet|
481:24: te gacchantastāṃścaurān dhūrtān śatrūṃśca śastrahastān paśyeyuḥ|
481:26: sa ca sārthavāhastaṃ sārthamevaṃ brūyāt-mā bhaiṣṭa kulaputrāḥ,
481:30: atha khalu sarva eva sa sārthaḥ ekasvareṇa avalokiteśvaramākrandet-namo namastasmai abhayaṃdadāyāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāyeti||
481:31: sahanāmagrahaṇenaiva sa sārthaḥ sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimukto bhavet|
481:32: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ||
481:34: te'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatarāgā bhavanti|
481:36: te'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatadveṣā bhavanti|
481:38: te'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kṛtvā vigatamohā bhavanti|
481:39: evaṃ maharddhikaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ||
481:40: yaśca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya putrakāmo mātṛgrāmo namaskāraṃ karoti,
481:41: tasya putraḥ prajāyate abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ|
481:44: tasya dārikā prajāyate abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgatā dārikā-lakṣaṇasamanvāgatā bahujanapriyā manāpā avaropitakuśalabhūlā ca bhavati|
481:45: īdṛśaḥ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prabhāvaḥ||
481:46: ye ca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kariṣyanti,
481:49: yaśca kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kariṣyati,
481:51: yaśca dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ namaskāraṃ kuryāt,
481:53: yaśca tāvatāmeva buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ pūjāṃ kuryāt,
481:54: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kiyantaṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavet?
481:56: bahu sugata sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahuṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavet|
481:57: bhagavānāha-yaśca kulaputra tāvatāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satkāraṃ kṛtvā puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
481:58: yaśca avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antaśa ekamapi namaskāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyaṃ ca dhārayet,
481:60: yaśca teṣāṃ dvāṣaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ satkāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyāni ca dhārayet,
481:61: yaśca avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya namaskāraṃ kuryāt nāmadheyaṃ ca dhārayet,
481:62: etāvubhau puṇyaskandhau na sukarau kṣapayituṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi|
481:63: evamaprameyaṃ kulaputra avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadhāraṇāt puṇyam||
481:64: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-kathaṃ bhagavan avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pravicarati?
481:67: evamukte bhagavānakṣayamatiṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-santi kulaputra lokadhātavaḥ yeṣvavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddharūpeṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
481:69: yeṣvavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvarūpeṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
481:70: keṣāṃcit pratyekabuddharūpeṇa avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
481:71: keṣāṃcicchrāvakarūpeṇa avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
481:72: keṣāṃcid brahmarūpeṇāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
481:74: keṣāṃcid gandharvarūpeṇāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
481:75: keṣāṃcid gandharvarūpeṇāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati|
481:86: tasmāttarhi kulaputra avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pūjayadhvam|
481:87: eṣa kulaputra avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhītānāṃ sattvānāmabhayaṃ dadāti|
481:88: anena kāraṇena abhayaṃdada iti saṃjñāyate iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau||
481:89: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat-dāsyāmo vayaṃ bhagavan avalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya dharmaprābhṛtaṃ dharmācchādam|
481:91: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhasattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakaṇṭhādavartāya śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāramavalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya dharmācchādamanuprayacchati sma-pratīccha satpuruṣa imaṃ dharmācchādaṃ mamāntikāt|
481:93: atha khalvakṣayamatirbodhisattvo mahāsattvo'valokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat-pratigṛhāṇa tvaṃ kulaputra imaṃ muktāhāramasmākamanukampāmupādāya|
481:94: atha khalvavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'kṣayamaterbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikāt taṃ muktāhāraṃ pratigṛhṇāti sma akṣayamaterbodhisattvasya mahasattvasyānukampāmupādāya,
481:95: tāsāṃ ca catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ teṣāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragarūḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāmanukampāmupādāya|
481:97: kṛtvā caikaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ bhagavate śākyamunaye dadāti sma,
481:98: dvitīyaṃ pratyaṃśaṃ bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpe samupanāmayāyāsa|
481:99: īdṛśyā kulaputra vikurvayā avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuvicarati||
481:100: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata—
481:177: atha khalu akṣamatirhṛṣṭatuṣṭamanā imā gāthā abhāṣata—
481:233: kṣipra bhomi yatha tvaṃ narottama||33|| iti||
481:234: atha khalu dharaṇiṃdharo bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya bhagavantametadavocat-na te bhagavan sattvāḥ avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
481:235: ye'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyemaṃ dharmaparyāyaparivartaṃ śroṣyanti avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vikurvānirdeśaṃ samantamukhaparivartaṃ nāma avalokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya vikurvaṇaprātihāryam||
481:236: asmin khalu punaḥ samantamukhaparivarte bhagavatā nirdeśyamāne tasyāḥ parṣadaścaturaśītināṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmasamasamāyāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpannānyabhūvan||
